course_title: Topics in Jewish Rel & Culture: Film and the Holocaust
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 10 / Seats Avail: 8Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same as REL 270 2 and HIST 296 5)
This course satisfies the Religion major requirement Theme. 
This course, we will use moving images as primary sources for studying the Holocaust and its representations. We will examine materials ranging from amateur home movies depicting the prewar daily Jewish life, Nazi propaganda films, and liberation footage to postwar survivor video testimonies and Hollywood blockbusters.
course_description: Special Topics in Jewish Religion and Culture: Variety of subjects emphasizing Jewish Religion and Culture. Content will vary. May be repeated when the topic changes.
sections: Class Nbr: 4682, Section #: 2, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: A. Podbielska, Status: Open
